content: Comes with all attached info including psn login Activision login and blizzard info, I've spent well over $500 on skins and stuff not counting the $180 I paid for access from PSN to coldwar modern warfare and vanguard( your getting the PSN account with the cod account purchase) I've spent an insane amount of time on these good games I've got gold on a few coldwar guns I've got diamond melee ar smg and I think shorty and pistols on vanguard I've got gold silver and Damascus unlocked on almost every gun in modern warfare and I've got 9 obsidians unlocked. I'm asking $140 for Activision PSN and blizzard login info, please let me know if interested. Would love it if you could get a decent escrow but if not I'm willing to send login info first. Please just lmk.
